DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the long-term safety, tolerability and efficacy of neramexane mesylate in the treatment of congenital idiopathic nystagmus (CIN). In addition, a subgroup of multiple sclerosis (MS) patients suffering from acquired nystagmus will be included.
DOC.brief_title: Open-lable Extension Study on Safety and Efficacy of Neramexane to Treat Congenital and Acquired Nystagmus
DOC.criteria: patients who has succesfully completed the leadin study MRZ 925790707/1 Occurence of any major treatmentemergent adverse event or condition during the previous protocol (MRZ 925790707/1)
